full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN RDOR LEGS KYI 'BUL BA'I GSHEGS GTOR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(ZHES BSTAN BSRUNG DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA LA GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL TSUL 'PHRIN LAS KUN BSGRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RANG GI SLOB MA MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA @010B SMAN RAM PA DGE TSUL BLO BZANG LHUN GRUB KYIS NAN CHER BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS SKU SKYES SU MA TI AARTHA SIDDHI MING CAN GYIS DAM PA'I GSUNG LTAR YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO LA BRTEN NAS THOB PA'I SHES RAB DAD LDAN THO YON BLO BZANG SHES RAB KYIS BRIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS, ,)
